AbstractCoinAcceptor - Interface in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator
A simple interface to allow a device to communicate with another device that accepts coins.
AbstractHardware<T extends AbstractHardwareListener> - Class in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator
The abstract base class for all hardware devices involved in the vending machine simulator.

AbstractHardwareListener - Interface in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator
This class represents the abstract interface for all hardware listeners.
AbstractPopCanAcceptor - Interface in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator
A simple interface to allow a device to communicate with another device that accepts pop cans.

activated(IndicatorLightSimulator) - Method in interface lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.IndicatorLightSimulatorListener

addCoin(Coin) - Method in class lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.CoinSlotSimulator

addPop(PopCan) - Method in class lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.PopCanRackSimulator
